events.message: I received my order last week but the wrong size was sent, and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been categorized under refund due to incorrect product size received.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong-sized product.
Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear about the size issue, and I'm here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the product showing the size tag? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and I've attached a photo of the incorrect size tag on the shirt I received.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send back the item.
That sounds great, thank you for your quick response and assistance with this refund.
We confirm your refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
We are closing this case now. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance.
